author: Cvico
body:
Dear reviewers,

This is a PR to include the weights for the newest version of the ttHMVA which is to be included in the future Run 3 MC nanoAOD. The weights are included as an xml, just as it was done for the Run 2 version of the MVA.

Best regards,
Carlos Vico
title: Weights for ttH mva Run 3
